quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: Books are a uniquely portable magic
author: Stephen King

quote: No two persons ever read the same book
author: Edmund Wilson

quote: Reading gives us somewhere to go when we have to stay where we are
author: Mason Cooley

quote: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: A book is a dream that you hold in your hand
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: We lose ourselves in books. We find ourselves there too
author: Anonymous

quote: So many books, so little time
author: Frank Zappa

quote: The only important thing in a book is the meaning that it has for you
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Once you learn to read, you will be forever free
author: Frederick Douglas

quote: Books are mirrors: you only see in them what you already have inside you
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafron

quote: It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I cannot live without books
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Reading one book is like eating one potato chip
author: Diane Duanne

quote: Books are the mirrors of the soul
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: We live for books
author: Umberto Eco

quote: A good book is an event in my life
author: Stendhal

quote: My library is an archive of longings
author: Susan Sontag

quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go
author: Dr. Seuss
